EmailTemplate.name: Send for Negotiation
EmailTemplate.subject: {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.APXT_Redlining__Account__c} | Request for your Feedback on {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.APXT_Redlining__Type__c} Contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello, A {!Organization.Name} associate requests your feedback on the attached contract agreement. To respond, please download the editable document, make your changes, and reply to this email with the modified file attached. If you have no changes, please reply with an unchanged copy of the attached file as no response will prevent the contract from advancing. Do not change the document name or modify the subject line in your reply or your response may not be received. If you have any questions, please reach out to {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName}. Thanks, {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.OwnerFirstName}
